trello_event_2.label: Investigating
trello_event_2.name: [R-99/Peacekeeper] Specific trials not tracking in BR/Mixtape
trello_event_2.translated_name: [R-99/和平捍卫者]特定试炼在 BR/Mixtape 中无法跟踪
trello_event_2.desc:
Challenges not tracking in BR/Mixtape Modes:

- R-: Down an enemy with the weapon without releasing the trigger using hipfire
- Peacekeeper: Down an enemy with all pellets landed on target in a blast

trello_event_3.name: Founder's badge shows as locked, but can still be equipped

trello_event_4.translated_name: 武器精通 + 追踪器显示不同数值

trello_event_5.translated_name: [欢迎通行证]卡在 39 级/最终奖励未颁发

trello_event_6.label: Fix in Progress
trello_event_6.name: [Akimbo] Held XP is low in match summary
trello_event_6.translated_name: [双持武器] 比赛摘要中持有的 XP 较少

trello_event_7.label: Fix in Progress
trello_event_7.name: Friends list shows yourself as friend
trello_event_7.translated_name: 好友列表显示自己为好友

trello_event_8.label: Fix in Progress
trello_event_8.name: [DirectX] Not enough shaders loading in at boot, occasionally results in stutters and/or missing textures or models
trello_event_8.translated_name: [DirectX] 启动时加载的着色器数量不足，偶尔会导致卡顿和/或纹理或模型丢失
trello_event_8.desc: There is a known issue where we don't compile enough shaders in the main menu, leading to stuttering and sometimes missing textures or models in the game. This issue can randomly affect either DX or DX.

trello_event_36.label: Fix Released
trello_event_36.name: Adaptive Supersampling causes screen tearing during gameplay
trello_event_36.translated_name: 自适应超级采样导致游戏过程中屏幕撕裂
trello_event_36.desc: Temporary workaround is to disable adaptive supersampling in the settings until a fix can be finalized and released.

trello_event_38.label: Fix Released
trello_event_38.name: [PC] Freezing in lobby for players
trello_event_38.desc:
Enabling "Spot Shadow Detail" and "Dynamic Spot Shadows" in Video Settings may assist some players, but is not a full workaround.

Appears to be impacting quad-core machines.

trello_event_39.label: Fix Released
trello_event_39.name: [PS] Launching Apex in FR with language pack results in crash
trello_event_39.translated_name: [PS] 使用语言包在 FR 中启动 Apex 会导致崩溃
trello_event_39.desc: Players can delete the language pack and/or switch to EN or another language to continue playing in the meantime.

trello_event_105.name: Emote wheel not available during Champion screen.
trello_event_105.translated_name: 在捍卫者画面中无法使用表情轮。

trello_event_106.label: Fix Released
trello_event_106.name: Blank Death Recap when match ends and player isn't the Champion
trello_event_106.translated_name: 当比赛结束且玩家不是捍卫者时的空白死亡回顾

trello_event_107.label: Fix Released
trello_event_107.name: Cannot interact with ziplines during banner retrieval animation.
trello_event_107.translated_name: 无法在收回旗帜动画期间与滑索互动。

trello_event_108.label: Fix Released
trello_event_108.name: While using DX12 and low detail model settings, scanning a ring console will crash the client.
trello_event_108.translated_name: 在使用 DX12 和低细节模型设置时，扫描安全区控制台会使客户端崩溃。

trello_event_109.label: Fix Released
trello_event_109.name: [Switch] Players may not be able to login with Dressed to Kill
trello_event_109.translated_name: [Switch] 玩家可能无法使用 "衣锦还乡 "登录

trello_event_110.label: Fix Released
trello_event_110.name: [Ballistic] Swapping Sling Weapons with Loot Vending Machine doesn't update weapon UI
trello_event_110.translated_name: [弹道] 使用战利品自动售货机交换挂袋武器不会更新武器 UI

trello_event_111.label: Fix Released
trello_event_111.name: [World's Edge] The sun is too bright when looking at players above you.
trello_event_111.translated_name: [世界边缘]看上方的玩家时，太阳太亮了。

trello_event_112.label: Fix Released
trello_event_112.name: [World's Edge] Appears brighter than normal.
trello_event_112.translated_name: [世界边缘] 比正常情况下更亮。

trello_event_113.label: Fix Released
trello_event_113.name: [Wraith] In certain conditions, Wraith can shoot while downed.
trello_event_113.translated_name: [恶灵] 在某些情况下，恶灵可以在被击落时射击。

trello_event_114.label: Fix Released
trello_event_114.name: [Catalyst] Scan Highlights and Diamonds visible through Dark Veil
trello_event_114.translated_name: [卡特莉斯] 通过黑暗面纱看到扫描亮点和钻石

trello_event_115.label: Fix Released
trello_event_115.name: [Firing Range] Joining a player in-progress will not bring recent changes made in lobby.
trello_event_115.translated_name: [射击场] 加入进行中的玩家不会带来大厅中最近的更改。

trello_event_116.label: Fix Released
trello_event_116.name: [Arsenal] Players are currently limited to Firing Range
trello_event_116.translated_name: [武器库赛季] 玩家目前仅限于射击场

trello_event_117.label: Fix Released
trello_event_117.name: [Ballistic] When two Ballistics lock each other with Whistler, weapon and reticles disappear after one has unlocked themselves.
trello_event_117.translated_name: [弹道]当两个 "弹道 "使用 "口哨儿 "锁定对方时，武器和瞄准镜会在其中一个自行解锁后消失。

trello_event_118.label: Fix Released
trello_event_118.name: [Predator] Rank displays total LP incorrectly in lower ranks
trello_event_118.translated_name: [顶尖猎杀者] 排位赛在较低等级中显示的 LP 总值不正确

trello_event_119.label: Fix Released
trello_event_119.name: [Catalyst] Frame rate drops when prepping Dark Veil.
trello_event_119.translated_name: [卡特莉斯] 准备黑暗面纱时帧速率下降。

trello_event_120.label: Fix Released
trello_event_120.name: Being in Ash's Phase Breach when Ash dies can result in redirects player to a random location
trello_event_120.translated_name: 艾许死亡时，处于艾许的相位突破中的玩家可能会重新定向到一个随机位置

trello_event_121.label: Fix Released
trello_event_121.name: [Switch] Some Switch accounts have not been corrected after a previous persistence issue was resolved.
trello_event_121.translated_name: [Switch]之前的持久性问题解决后，一些 Switch 账户仍未更正。

trello_event_122.label: Fix Released
trello_event_122.name: Audio and VFX drops since S16 launch
trello_event_122.translated_name: 音频和视觉特效自 S16 发布以来有所下降

trello_event_123.label: Fix Released
trello_event_123.name: Gibraltar's Defensive Bombardment warning horn does not play. (All other related audio does)
trello_event_123.translated_name: 直布罗陀的防御轰炸警报喇叭没有响起。(所有其他相关音频都能播放）

trello_event_124.label: Fix Released
trello_event_124.name: Caustic traps disappear when thrown in front of closed doors that are then opened.
trello_event_124.translated_name: 侵蚀陷阱扔到紧闭的门前就会消失，然后再打开。

trello_event_125.label: Fix Released
trello_event_125.name: While using the Bangalore Legend with Viceroy Skin if you ADS with certain scopes (1x Holo & the 2x4x Variable) while using Tactical a texture will block screen.
trello_event_125.translated_name: 在使用带有 "总督皮肤 "的班加罗尔传奇时，如果使用某些瞄准镜（一倍圆和 2x4x 可变瞄准镜）进行 ADS，在使用 "战术 "时，纹理会遮挡屏幕。

trello_event_126.label: Fix Released
trello_event_126.name: Crouch ADS with the prowler does not function after crouching a few times.
trello_event_126.translated_name: 使用猎兽的下蹲 ADS 在下蹲几次后不起作用。

trello_event_127.label: Fix Released
trello_event_127.name: When holding the tactical button to deploy and jump to Echo, Echo will spawn where Vantage spawned, or to the last position Echo was recalled to.
trello_event_127.translated_name: 当按住战术按钮部署并跳到 Echo 时，Echo 会在万蒂奇生成的地方生成，或者到 Echo 被召回的最后一个位置。

trello_event_128.label: Fix Released
trello_event_128.name: "Splash Zone" ironsight for Flatline is much wider/clearer compared with other Flatline skins
trello_event_128.translated_name: 与其他 VK-47 皮肤相比，VK-47 的 "溅射区 "瞄准镜更宽/更清晰

trello_event_129.label: Fix Released
trello_event_129.name: Default commands for removing/transferring attachments for weapons was swapped
trello_event_129.translated_name: 移除/转移武器配件的默认命令已交换

trello_event_130.label: Fix Released
trello_event_130.name: [Belgium] players are unable to purchase Sun Squad items.
trello_event_130.translated_name: [比利时]玩家无法购买太阳小队物品。

trello_event_131.label: Fix Released
trello_event_131.name: Performance and stability issues on Xbox platforms
trello_event_131.translated_name: Xbox 平台上的性能和稳定性问题

trello_event_132.label: Fix Released
trello_event_132.name: UI is not accurate for Team Deathmatch
trello_event_132.translated_name: 团队死斗的用户界面不准确

trello_event_133.label: Fix Released
trello_event_133.name: If you see ORIENTATION MATCH on the @PlayApex game mode selector and shouldn't - read here.
trello_event_133.translated_name: 如果您在 @PlayApex 游戏模式选择器上看到了迎新赛，但不应该看到 - 请阅读此处。

trello_event_134.label: Fix Released
trello_event_134.name: [EA App players only] players that buy Apex Coins don't get an updated Coin balance until they restart the game.
trello_event_134.translated_name: [仅限 EA App 玩家]购买 Apex 硬币的玩家在重启游戏前不会获得更新的硬币余额。

trello_event_135.label: Fix Released
trello_event_135.name: [SWITCH ONLY] A small number of Switch players may appear as level 1 or are missing other statistics. We are continuing to investigate the issue and will update ASAP.
trello_event_135.translated_name: [仅限 Switch]少数 Switch 玩家可能显示为 1 级或缺少其他统计数据。我们正在继续调查该问题，并将尽快更新。

trello_event_136.name: UI Images error when playing Olympus
trello_event_136.translated_name: 玩奥林匹斯时出现 UI 图像错误

trello_event_137.label: Fix Released
trello_event_137.name: The third person easter egg can't be activated
trello_event_137.translated_name: 第三人称彩蛋无法激活

trello_event_138.label: Fix Released
trello_event_138.name: Custom Match is missing certain button prompts
trello_event_138.translated_name: 自定义匹配缺少某些按钮提示

trello_event_139.label: Fix Released
trello_event_139.name: Blank ping and emote wheels in the Firing Range
trello_event_139.translated_name: 射击场中的空白标记和表情轮

trello_event_140.label: Fix Released
trello_event_140.name: Wraiths eliminated by headshots create blue and orange particle effects
